title: Fs 5 Polo Grounds postcards w/ Mcgraw all different
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: Fs 5 Polo Grounds postcards w/ Mcgraw all different
posts.post_content:
SOLD a group of Polo Grounds postcards all picture Hall of Fame Manager John Mcgraw in the upper right hand corner and all are Differant!!
2 have been used and cancel dates are 1914 and 1916. The others are from the same period a few years earlier or later. SOLD and I will mail to any US address. Regular paypal is fine. 
J
